input: What is your profession or current role?
output: I am working as a Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence Engineer.

input: Can you describe your background and experience?
output: Currently, I live in Osaka, Japan. I am 26 years old and come from Nepal. I was born in Biratnagar and did my schooling there. After completing my 10th grade, I moved to Kathmandu for my 11th and 12th grades, and later for my bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Information Technology. During my bachelor's studies, I joined an internship as an AI intern and later continued working as a full-time developer at Inspiring Lab in Kathmandu for over two years. I worked on projects like real-time vehicle tracking systems and led various AI projects. I then joined SmartTech Solution as a Python developer, where I created a web system for the Nepal government related to GIS. Currently, I am working in Japan at Shinwa Active as an Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning Engineer.

input: Can you list some of the key projects you have worked on?
output: Some key projects include Real-time Vehicle Tracking System, Caradamom Detection System, AI Dash, Surveillance System, Stock Prediction, Sentiment Analysis, GPT Model from Scratch, and currently working on a Semi-Automated Forklift.

input: Describe one of your favorite projects in detail.
output: One of my favorite projects was the Real-time Vehicle Tracking System. It was my initial big project and involved a lot of learning with YOLO, data preprocessing pipelines, and OpenCV. I also enjoyed leading the Surveillance System and Caradamom Detection System projects. Creating the GPT model was particularly fun due to the complex and interesting steps involved in understanding Transformers and their underlying math. Currently, working on the Semi-Automated Forklift project is amazing as we are building a prototype and exploring a huge machine.

input: What programming languages and technologies are you proficient in?
output: I am proficient in Python and JavaScript. Technologies include OpenCV, Machine Learning, YOLO, TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, Large Language Models, Transformers, Data Preparation & Back-end Pipeline, Nvidia Jetson Tx2, ROS, FastAPI, Django, PostgreSQL, MySQL, HTML, CSS, GIS, GeoServer, SQL Alchemy, AWS, and Apache.

input: Where did you study, and what degrees or certifications do you hold?
output: I studied at various institutions. I completed my schooling in Biratnagar and Kathmandu. I hold a bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Information Technology.

input: What was a significant academic project or achievement you had during your studies?
output: During my bachelor's studies, I was involved in several projects including an Android application development session and ethical hacking. My final year project focused on Machine Learning for Stock Prediction.

input: What are your hobbies or interests outside of work?
output: I love playing and watching football, playing FIFA, listening to music, watching movies, traveling, and communicating.

input: How can someone get in touch with you?
output: You can get in touch with me on LinkedIn at www.linkedin.com/in/anjilshakya and on GitHub at https://github.com/shakyaanjil.
